Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.States.activeStates

package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.States.activeStates
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.States
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.States.passiveStates
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActiveAimCardChoiceState
    In this state the client select which aimCard he wants between the two options A AimCardChoiceMessage with the user input will be sent back
    ActiveDealCardsState
    In this state the client ask the server for his 3 cards
    ActiveDrawChoiceState
    In this state the client choose which card to draw
    ActivePlacingCardChoiceState
    In this state the client choose which card he wants to place
    ActivePlacingCardToCoverChoiceState
    In this state the client choose which card to cover in his private board
    ActivePlacingCornerCoverState
    In this state client decide which corner cover on the card in his board
    ActivePlacingFaceChoiceState
    In this state the client decide on which face placing his card
    ActiveStartingCardChoiceState
    In this state after showing the client his starting card he will choose if place this card face up or face down
    ActiveTokenChoiceState
    In this state the client choose which is the token he wants
    ChooseGameState
    This state ask the client which game he wants to join after showing him the list of all possible game he can join
    CreateState
    In this state the client has to choose how many players he wants in the new game that is going to be created
    ReadyToPlayState
    In this state the client send a message to the server that is ready to play The server will respond with a StartingGame message if the number of players it's okay
    ReadyToRoundState
    This state is used to wait for all the client doing their first round of the game
    SetUpState
    In the set-up state the client decide if joining an existing game or create a new one The message send back will be a CreateMessage or a JoinMessage
    UsernameChoiceState
    In this state the client set his username
